channel.title: about on Conor Fleming
channel.description: Recent content in about on Conor Fleming

item.title: About
item.description: As an engineering scientist at Coanda, I focus on computational modelling of complex fluid flows to solve immediate industrial challenges. Over the last ten years I have gained a broad range of experience as a mechanical engineer in academic and industrial settings. My doctoral research at the University of Oxford examined the performance of tidal stream turbines in highly-turbulent open channel flows via CFD modelling. As a tunnel ventilation engineer with Atkins and subsequently SNC-Lavalin, I developed expertise in numerical and physical modelling of heat and mass transport through tunnels and buildings.
